  • Constructor Details

    • Health

      public Health(int healthPoints)
      Constructs a Health object with the specified initial health points. Initializes the health label, font, color, and graphical properties.
      Parameters:
      healthPoints - The initial health points.

  • Method Details

    • decrease

      public void decrease(int healthPoints)
      Decreases the health points by the specified amount. Plays a negative beep sound when health is decreased.
      Parameters:
      healthPoints - The amount to decrease the health points.

    • increase

      public void increase(int healthPoints)
      Increases the health points by the specified amount, up to the maximum.
      Parameters:
      healthPoints - The amount to increase the health points.

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the health points have reached zero.
      Returns:
      true if health points are zero, false otherwise.
